writeLFCsByLenBin <- function(binLenFile){
  lens.bin6 <- read.csv(binLenFile)
  int.fxs.bin6 <- intersect(lens.bin6$x, rownames(res_fxs_shrunk))
  int.dko.bin6 <- intersect(lens.bin6$x, rownames(res_dko_shrunk))
  lens.bin6 <- read.csv(binLenFile)
  res_fxs.bin6 <- res_fxs_shrunk[int.fxs.bin6,]
  res_dko.bin6 <- res_dko_shrunk[int.dko.bin6,]
  fxsIntDko.bin6 <- data.frame(fxs=res_fxs.bin6$log2FoldChange, dko=res_dko.bin6$log2FoldChange, row.names = rownames(res_fxs.bin6))
}
binTab <- writeLFCsByLenBin(\~/bioChem/longGenes_bin6.csv\")
